_header: Penes the bearer that was Mary the maid
_description: Prayers regarding the Virgin Mary and Christ — three monorhyming lines

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
penes þe berer þat was mari þe maide [ ]penes hym
                    þat was born þe sone of heuen kyngpenes þe man þat was
                    wondirfull of beryng
